alert.note: Alert for Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pima and southwestern Santa Cruz Counties through 330 PM MST... At 245 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rio Rico, or 8 miles northwest of Nogales, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nogales, Tubac, Rio Rico, Nogales International Airport, Patagonia Lake State Park, Tumacacori, Pena Blanca Lake and Ruby. This includes the following highways... Interstate 19 between mile markers 2 and 22. Route 82 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
